con:testSuite.name: TD400_UC2_titania
con:testSuite.con:description: This test suite is the collection of test cases described in the O3S Software Validation Specificaiton document (O3S_SVS), section 7.5 Test Cases for TD_400. The test cases may be run individually, or all together using 'Launch TestRunner'. This test suite is set up for the dataset for UC2 on the machine titania.

con:configuration.content: <ows:OperationsMetadata xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows/2.0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"> <ows:Operation name="GetCapabilities"> <ows:DCP> <ows:HTTP> <ows:Post xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="*"> <ows:Constraint name="PostEncoding"> <ows:AllowedValues> <ows:Value>SOAP</ows:Value> </ows:AllowedValues> </ows:Constraint> </ows:Post> </ows:HTTP> </ows:DCP> </ows:Operation> <ows:Operation name="DescribeCoverage"> <ows:DCP> <ows:HTTP> <ows:Post xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="*"> <ows:Constraint name="PostEncoding"> <ows:AllowedValues> <ows:Value>SOAP</ows:Value> </ows:AllowedValues> </ows:Constraint> </ows:Post> </ows:HTTP> </ows:DCP> </ows:Operation> <ows:Operation name="GetCoverage"> <ows:DCP> <ows:HTTP> <ows:Post xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="*"> <ows:Constraint name="PostEncoding"> <ows:AllowedValues> <ows:Value>SOAP</ows:Value> </ows:AllowedValues> </ows:Constraint> </ows:Post> </ows:HTTP> </ows:DCP> </ows:Operation> <ows:Operation name="DescribeEOCoverageSet"> <ows:DCP> <ows:HTTP> <ows:Post xlink:type="simple" xlink:href="*"> <ows:Constraint name="PostEncoding"> <ows:AllowedValues> <ows:Value>SOAP</ows:Value> </ows:AllowedValues> </ows:Constraint> </ows:Post> </ows:HTTP> </ows:DCP> </ows:Operation> <ows:Constraint name="CountDefault"> <ows:NoValues/> <ows:DefaultValue>*</ows:DefaultValue> </ows:Constraint> </ows:OperationsMetadata>

con:testCase.name: Unknown Operation TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: Test for gettting a soap fault in response to an unrecognised operation.

con:testCase.name: DescribeCoverage Bad Id TestCase
con:testCase.con:description: Test for an ivalid ID in DescribeCoverage.

con:configuration.content: <ows:Exception locator="BadId" exceptionCode="NoSuchCoverage" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows/2.0"> <ows:ExceptionText>No coverage with coverage id 'BadId' found</ows:ExceptionText> </ows:Exception>
